title: Illicit Promises
description: We both claim we're over each other, so why do we keep finding ourselves back in each other's arms?CarterI thought I was over her, right until she walked back into my life. My head knows she and I will end in disaster, yet my heart can't deny her. Maybe I can convince Emilia to make me her dirty little secret...EmiliaCarter is still the only one I want and the only one I desire. He's also still the only one I can't have. How am I going to survive college when he's everywhere, tempting me to break the promises I've made. Author's Note: Stolen Moments is book 2 in a trilogy that follows Emilia Parker and Carter Clarke through high school, college and finally adulthood.This book was previously titled Chaos. The title has changed, but the story has not.
author: Catharina Maura
